titleStmt.title: My Lord Newarks speech to the trained-bands of Nottingham-shire at Newark, 13. July. 1642. Concerning His Maiesties commission of array.
Speech to the trained-bands of Nottingham-shire at Newark, 13 July, 1642
titleStmt.author: Dorchester, Henry Pierrepont, Marquis of, 1606-1680.

notesStmt.note: Title page contains printers' device (McK. 422, with rose).
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
